name: Ridiculous Rugby
description:
Ridiculous Rugby puts you in the shoes of a squad playing a rapid fire arcade rugby with entirely 3D physics based ragdolls. Built to focus on the speed, impact, tackling, fighting for every inch of the game. With retro 8-bit inspired cartoon characters and action.

Tackle, smash, drive, and wrestle your opponents in a sport experience like you’ve never played or felt before. Ridiculous Rugby is built from the ground up entirely physics driven. With powered ragdolls that can run, jump, kick, and tackle each other, battling for the ball and to score.

Play together as a team with friends, or smash heads trying to out play them with local multiplayer.
